rounds.category: THE CHARACTER'S NAME HAS BEEN CHANGED
rounds.comments: (Alex: I'll give you a quote in which the name has been changed. You have to give the correct name.)

rounds.text: He became an ex-president while flying over a point 13 miles southwest of Jefferson City, Missouri
